# Rstudio codes

- Limpiar consola o terminal
  - ctrl + L  
- Asignar un objeto
  - ctrl + -
- Operador pipe
  - ctrl + shift + m
- Ejecutar código en la consola
  - ctrl + enter
- Ejecutar código en el terminal
  - ctrl + alt + m
  

# Bash code

```{bash}
#| eval: false

cd # change directory
rm # remove file or folder
ls # list files
mkdir # create a directory
open # open file or directory
```

# GitHub

## User

## Create a SSH key

```{bash}
#| eval: false

ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "flozano@lamolina.edu.pe" 
cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
```

- Insertar SSH key en GitHub <https://github.com/settings/keys>

## Info: local > server (firs time)

```{bash}
#| eval: false

git init
git add .
git commit -m "first commit"
git branch -M main
git remote add origin git@github.com:Flavjack/cif.git # remplazar!
git push -u origin main
```

```{bash}
#| eval: false

git config --global user.name flozano

git config --global user.email flozano@lamolina.edu.pe
```

## Info: local > server (updates)

```{bash}
#| eval: false

git add .
git commit -m "update"
git push
```

## Info: server > local

```{bash}
#| eval: false

git pull
```
